headline.main: HAGOOD HITS WAR PLANS; General Lays Pearl Harbor Disaster to 'Faulty Organization'

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 31 (AP) -- Major Gen. Johnson Hagood, retired coastal defense commander, asserted today that the Pearl Harbor disaster resulted largely from "faulty organization" of the War Department along with a "lack of authority and responsibility."
abstract: Maj Gen J Hagood blames Hawaii disaster on U S War Dept faulty organization
